title: AST Explorer Helper
subtitle: Make AST analysis simpler and more efficient

hideToolbar.title: Hide Toolbar
hideToolbar.description: Ability to hide the toolbar, increasing view space for a more comfortable code analysis experience

rightClickCopy.title: Right-Click Copy
rightClickCopy.description: Support quick copying of node content with right-click menu while preserving original formatting

efficiency.title: Boost Efficiency
efficiency.description: Say goodbye to manual copying hassles and make AST analysis work more efficient

easyToUse.title: Easy to Use
easyToUse.description: No complex configuration needed, install and use immediately with intuitive operations

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Completely open source, community-driven, and continuously improving

step1.title: Install Userscript Manager
step1.description: First, install a userscript manager in your browser:

step2.title: Install the Script
step2.description: After installing the userscript manager, click the button below to install the AST Explorer Helper:
step2.note: Note: If the button doesn't work, you can also:
step2.dragAndDrop: Manually drag and drop the file into your userscript manager page

step3.title: Start Using
step3.autoEnable: The script will be automatically enabled
step3.enjoyFeature: Now you can freely select and copy AST node content!
